icao24.label: ICAO 24
icao24.tip: Unique ICAO 24-bit address of the transponder in hex string representation

squawk.label: Squawk
squawk.tip: Assigned by air traffic controllers to identify a vehicle over radio

origin_country.label: Origin Country
origin_country.tip: Country name inferred from the ICAO 24-bit address

on_ground.label: On Ground
on_ground.tip: Whether the vehicle is currently on the ground

baro_altitude.label: Barometric Altitude (m)
baro_altitude.tip: Determined by measuring surrounding atmospheric pressure

geo_altitude.label: Geometric Altitude (m)
geo_altitude.tip: Determined using specialized electronic equipment like GPS

vertical_rate.label: Vertical Rate (m/s)
vertical_rate.tip: Positive value indicaes that the vehicle is climbing, while a negative value indicates that it is descending

true_track.label: True Track
true_track.tip: Degrees from North of vehicle's current heading

time_position.label: Last Position Update
time_position.tip: Timestamp of last position update from vehicle

last_contact.label: Last Contact
last_contact.tip: Timestamp of last contact from vehicle transponder

spi.label: Special Purpose
spi.tip: Whether flight status is marked with a special prupose indicator

sensors.label: Sensors
sensors.tip: IDs of receivers which were used to gather vehicle information

position_source.label: Position Source
position_source.tip: System used to determine vehicle's position
